note: You don't need a reason to help people. Professional writer, advocate, and educator here working towards a better future for everyone.

name: Charity
value: I am acknowledged by members of the United States Government and recognized by many worthwhile causes including, The Carter Foundation, Christians Reaching Out Serving Students, and many other worthwhile causes.

name: Misfortune
value: I was born with several types of a degenerative disease, muscular dystrophy.

name: Animals
value: I am a devoted animal lover. Some see me as a dog whisperer.

name: Respect
value: Respect is important to me, please show thoughtful consideration to me and my friends.
